channel.title: Vip kicking thingy
channel.description: Ok on my server people been sneaking in to the vip area but its only for donators how do i make it so when people on the server are not vip to make a lil kicky thingy that sends them back home?

item.title: Vip kicking thingy
item.dc:creator: @kelly15 kelly15
item.description:
@kelly15 wrote:

Im using delta based aka ddsspeced source

Read full topic

item.title: Vip kicking thingy
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Try something like this, of course this wont be formatted correctly for your server, but it will give you some kind of idea on the format.

This could go in the Process of client.java, not the best place to have it, but it works there.

if((absX >= TOPLEFTX || absX <= BOTTOMRIGHTX) && (absY >= TOPLEFTY || absY <= BOTTOMRIGHTY))
    if (VIP == false) {
        toX = X-you-want-him-teleported-to;
        toY = Y-you-want-him-teleported-to;
    } else {
        return;
    }
}

Read full topic

item.title: Vip kicking thingy
item.dc:creator: @v0x v0x
item.description:
@v0x wrote:

i am sure there are codes you can write to allow only VIP members to attack or trade certain npcs so that any player non vip will have wasted his/her time getting there.

I dont know if you can do that with shops, but im pretty sure you can.

Read full topic
